name: Raymond Hulha
body:
# Welcome to my Homepage.

I am a German/American software developer with over 20 years of programming experience.  
I started with Basic on a C64.  
Then I switched to Turbo Pascal under DOS. I still have great memories about the great editor and documentation!  
For my university I learned C and switched to it for my personal projects too since I liked the less verbose syntax over Pascal.  
Also for my University I learned Java 18 years ago which I love to this day.  
  
I like to say that Java is not perfect, but its damn close. :-)  
  
For my effort to create a "perfect" language check out http://www.easy-lang.org  

# My Github Projects:
[https://github.com/rhulha](https://github.com/rhulha)

# My Gists:

- [SRT2VTT.java](https://gist.github.com/rhulha/3017fc640fee4b06e45847aae07f3376)
- [TestMarkLogic.java](https://gist.github.com/rhulha/10e1489d12429b548bb4f5301953a809)
- [TicTacToeUltraCompressed.java](https://gist.github.com/rhulha/8032bec1d3ae8e2c0818)
- [SkypeChatLogParser.java](https://gist.github.com/rhulha/7154dfe3ad270e6f7282)
- [deepCompare.java](https://gist.github.com/rhulha/255732567846bf4bef5b)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
